txt.en: Reeve Ingbert sent you to learn the fate of Thornhope, and you have found mounted Orcs patrolling the northern part of the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should defeat some of the Orcs.
Reeve Ingbert sent you to learn the fate of Thornhope, and you have found mounted Orcs patrolling the northern part of the Entwash Vale.
You have encountered mounted scouts of the enemy throughout the Entwash Vale
Mounted Orcs can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should hunt the mounted Orcs patrolling the Entwash Vale.
